names.pinyin: zhe shi tu bie chong tang
aka: Red Ochre and Ground Beetle Decoction

actions: Tonifies the Middle Jiao and augments Qi Tonifies the Lungs.
Clears and drains Lung Heat, transforms Phlegm, moistens Lung Dryness, relieves toxicity, expels pus and reduces swelling.
Tonifies the Spleen, nourishes Stomach Yin, tonifies Lung Qi and nourishes Lung Yin.
With Dang Shen, for Lung and Spleen Deficiency with cough, with thin watery sputum, anorexia fatigue and weight loss.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, sedates Fire and resolves Phlegm.
Breaks up Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation and drains abscesses.
With Hong Hua, invigorates the Blood for all types of Blood Stagnation.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
Breaks up and drives out Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation and disperses lumps and masses.
Attacks toxins and disperses Blood Stagnation.
